mapper.select:
select t1.type,t1.record_time,t1.students_id,(select real_name from sys_user where id = t1.students_id) as studentName,t1.teacher_id , (select real_name from sys_user where id = t1.teacher_id) as teacherName,t1.old_class_id,(select name from teach_class where id = t1.old_class_id) as oldClassName, t1.new_class_id,(select name from teach_class where id = t1.new_class_id ) as newClassName from teach_class_record t1 where t1.deleted = 0
and t1.type = #{query.type}
and studentName like concat('%',#{query.studentName},'%')
order by t1.record_time desc
